buttonmsg: A. What jobs are suitable for WIE?
B. I have no or less than 300 hrs job experience. I am looking for a job.
C. I have no or less than 300 hrs job experience. I just received an offer.
D. I have no or less than 300 hrs job experience. I am already employed.
E. I have 300 hrs, or more, of job experience.
F. Where can I find the forms?
errormsg:
Sorry, but I have no idea what you are talking about.

 對不起，我不能理解你這句的意思。

intromsg.intro2:
.  I am created to help you with WIE. I will try to answer your questions regarding WIE. Click one of the buttons to ask me a question. At any time, you can show the buttons again by clicking the keyboard icon next to the smiley on the bottom right hand corner.
你好，歡迎你使用PolyU SPEED WIE Telegram智能對話機械人!
你可以使用輸入框以下的按鍵去選擇你想向機械人查詢的資訊！
